_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The grasping [sn35.110:1.9]: The desire and greed for the eye
The desire and greed for the ear
The desire and greed for the nose
The desire and greed for the tongue
The desire and greed for the body
The desire and greed for the mind
